title: [SOLVED] Will the LAN server be going down since it is in Miami?
body: I'm not sure if this is the right board for this question, but...does anyone know if the LAN server will be taken offline while hurricane Irma passes over/near Miami?

replies.body: Well, AFAIK we certainly don't *plan* on bringing the servers down. But that's not to say that the weather might have some effect on those servers =\ . Personally hoping everyone is safe, as well as those servers!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eVKXjc3a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-08T02:24:14.646+0000)
>
> Well, AFAIK we certainly don't *plan* on bringing the servers down. But that's not to say that the weather might have some effect on those servers =\ . Personally hoping everyone is safe, as well as those servers!

Thanks for the update! I'll be sure to tell my friends who are here from Miami that they can still play their main accounts. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
